title: Banco BPM says UniCredit's 'unusual' $10.5 billion takeover offer does not reflect its profitability
content: UniCredit offered to snap up Banco BPM for roughly $10.5 billion on Monday.
summary: UniCredit offered to snap up Banco BPM for roughly $10.5 billion on Monday.

title: Trump’s tariff threats signal the start of a wild ride in currency markets
content: Donald Trump's vow to implement additional tariffs on China, Canada and Mexico signals the start of a wild ride in currency markets, strategists say.
summary: Donald Trump's vow to implement additional tariffs on China, Canada and Mexico signals the start of a wild ride in currency markets, strategists say.

title: Crypto market sheds $180 billion in a day as bitcoin slides further from $100,000 milestone
content: Bitcoin's price retreated further from the psychologically important $100,000 milestone as investors booked profits from the token's post-U.S. election gains.
summary: Bitcoin's price retreated further from the psychologically important $100,000 milestone as investors booked profits from the token's post-U.S. election gains.

title: Huawei launches first phones capable of running its new self-developed operating system
content: Huawei launched the Mate 70, Mate 70 Pro and Mate 70 Pro+ and foldable Mate X6 on Tuesday that can run HarmonyOS NEXT, its self-developed operating system.
summary: Huawei launched the Mate 70, Mate 70 Pro and Mate 70 Pro+ and foldable Mate X6 on Tuesday that can run HarmonyOS NEXT, its self-developed operating system.

title: Amgen says obesity drug caused up to 20% weight loss after a year, with no plateau
content: The results shed light on how MariTide may measure up to weight loss injections from Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly and other experimental treatments.
summary: The results shed light on how MariTide may measure up to weight loss injections from Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly and other experimental treatments.

title: Orange partners with OpenAI, Meta to develop custom African-language AI models
content: Orange is working with OpenAI and Meta to build custom AI models that can understand West African languages not understood by most conversational systems.
summary: Orange is working with OpenAI and Meta to build custom AI models that can understand West African languages not understood by most conversational systems.

title: Trump vows an additional 10% tariff on China, 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico
content: The president-elect plans to raise tariffs by an additional 10% on all Chinese goods coming into the U.S., according to a post on his social media platform Truth Social.
summary: The president-elect plans to raise tariffs by an additional 10% on all Chinese goods coming into the U.S., according to a post on his social media platform Truth Social.

title: Six travelers in Laos died from suspected tainted alcohol. Here's where most incidents occur
content: Six travelers have died from suspected methanol poisoning in Vang Vieng, Laos. Most of these incidents occur in Asia, according to Doctors Without Borders.
summary: Six travelers have died from suspected methanol poisoning in Vang Vieng, Laos. Most of these incidents occur in Asia, according to Doctors Without Borders.

title: 'We can overcome climate change': Richard Branson says young people should not be down about the future
content: Sir Richard Branson made the comments as he announced a partnership with the We Are Family Foundation, set up by musician Nile Rodgers after 9/11.
summary: Sir Richard Branson made the comments as he announced a partnership with the We Are Family Foundation, set up by musician Nile Rodgers after 9/11.

title: Meet the start-up working to save newborn babies and democratize pregnancy care
content: More than two million babies died in the first 20 days of their lives in 2022, and a startup, Biorithm, hopes to help prevent this with its monitoring device.
summary: More than two million babies died in the first 20 days of their lives in 2022, and a startup, Biorithm, hopes to help prevent this with its monitoring device.

title: Heathrow boss says 2025 to bring final decision on controversial third runway
content: Thomas Woldbye told the Airlines 2024 conference he expected a final decision "one way or another" on the long-running project by the end of 2025.
summary: Thomas Woldbye told the Airlines 2024 conference he expected a final decision "one way or another" on the long-running project by the end of 2025.

title: Tim Cook and other U.S. executives attend China expo, meet officials as Trump tariff threat looms

title: Bitcoin's march to $100,000 stalls. Here's what's keeping it below the milestone
content: Bitcoin is trading stubbornly below the $100,000 mark, putting the brakes on a blistering post-election rally.

title: Virgin Atlantic CEO says UK budget is 'tax on growth' with air duties set to rise
content: Shai Weiss said that despite aviation's contribution to the economy, "all we've seen is an increase in Air Passenger Duty."

title: Warren Buffett speaks out against creating family wealth dynasties, gives away another $1.1 billion
content: "I've never wished to create a dynasty or pursue any plan that extended beyond the children," Buffett wrote in a lengthy letter Monday.
summary: "I've never wished to create a dynasty or pursue any plan that extended beyond the children," Buffett wrote in a lengthy letter Monday.

title: Russian food prices are soaring — but no one dares blame Putin and the war
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has denied that Russia has exchanged "butter for guns" and blamed the price rises on "unfriendly" countries.

title: UniCredit offers to buy rival Italian lender Banco BPM for $10.5 billion
content: Italian lender UniCredit says its offer for domestic rival Banco BPM is separate from its pursuit of German bank Commerzbank.

title: Can Saudi Arabia keep pace with its ambitious mega-project spending spree?
content: "Saudi Arabia has poured tens of billions into projects that have yet to hint of any financial returns," one financier told CNBC.
summary: "Saudi Arabia has poured tens of billions into projects that have yet to hint of any financial returns," one financier told CNBC.

title: Singapore's inflation rate falls in October, hitting lowest point since March 2021
content: Singapore's core inflation measure — which strips out prices of accommodation and private transport — came in at 2.1%, down from the 2.8% seen in September.
summary: Singapore's core inflation measure — which strips out prices of accommodation and private transport — came in at 2.1%, down from the 2.8% seen in September.
